item.title: The Gentoo Drinking Game
item.description: Step 1 Begin by letting your friends to vote on what distro you should install. If they vote for Gentoo, you are now entitled to play the Gentoo Drinking Game. Note: the two “other” votes were for Windows XP SP3 and Windows Vista. Step 2 Gather some friends and your laptop. Go to the pub. Step 3 Install Gentoo. Follow these rules: Take a drink… Every 5 minutes Every time you fail to do something on the first try Every time you have to Google something If you ask the bar staff if they know how to install Gentoo Finish your drink… If you mess the install up so badly you have to start again If you give up Continue playing until… Gentoo has been installed You are far too inebriated to continue The pub wifi proves too slow to download the Stage 3 tarball and everyone gets bored of waiting Some quotes from our attempt This is a bad idea and will go horribly ~ Alex
